game.name: 东方铭珠塔
game.shortDescription: "Eastern Mingzhu Tower" is a multi-ending tower defense & AVG game. After the "Snow-house" is shattered by the tower's sudden emergence, you lead Ye-Luo Academy, its last guardian. Decide whether to intervene.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Eastern Mingzhu Tower" is a multi-ending tower defense & AVG game. After the "Snow-house" is shattered by the tower's sudden emergence, you lead Ye-Luo Academy, its last guardian. Decide whether to intervene.
